name: Conflict 3048
description:
A real time and fast paced tactical battle game on a world of humans and aliens.

Wage warfare against alien hordes. Defeat your enemies in the campaign.

Features Include

Single Player Campaign
A series of missions as you battle across an alien world.



Moddable
Users can create their own units, graphics, sounds, triggers and even gui elements with easy access to the game's textual data files and .png graphics and .wav audio.

A fully featured editor is included with scripting system, and even access to the game's source code in C#.
